cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: A Heart in Winter vol3
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: A love story full of tension and sensibility, starring the –real life, during filming– couple of Emmanuelle Béart and Daniel Auteuil, whose chemistry is carried on screen and absolutely captivates us. Golden Lion in Venice. cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: A Heart in Winter vol3 LOT1
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The effusive Maxim rules the craft of violin making with an iron fist, together with his best friend Stefan, a very lonely and introverted man, but an authority on violin repair. One day Maxim falls deeply in love with a violinist, Camille. And while they are about to move in together, Stefan comes out of his shell and decides to claim the beautiful woman, much to his friend's dismay. The effusive Maxim rules the craft of violin making with an iron fist, together with his best friend Stefan, a very lonely and introverted man, but an authority on violin repair. One day Maxim falls deeply in love with a violinist, Camille. And while they are about to move in together, Stefan comes out of his shell and decides to claim the beautiful woman, much to his friend's dismay.
